ai-patthana21.21:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.21:1.1_0: and it does not give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected with placing the mind and keeping it connected. You should give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected with reason.
ai-patthana21.21:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.21:2.1_0: or mental placing the mind and keeping it connected are without placing the mind, and without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-patthana21.21:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.21:3.1_0: You don’t give rise to the thought, without placing the mind, and keeping it connected. You shouldn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.21:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.21:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
